basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.name: Javier Cacho
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with expertise both in backend with .NET and frontend with React, working with the cutting edge technologies and trends in development and engaged with best practices and DevOps

work.summary: Developing a key product for empower business analyticis for SAP
highlights: Working in a dynamic environment usint Scrum and with the administration done in JIRA
Developing of Web API backend in C# using .NET 4.5, WebApi 2.0, NUnit and SpecFlow
Developing of frontend using React with Jest, enzyme, flowtype
Supporting to testing task with TestRail and Specflow for integration tests
Working in a continous integration environment with git, VSTS and SonarQube

work.position: Senior Full Stack Developer and Team Leader
work.summary: Developing and maintaining several .NET applications and SQL ETL processes
highlights: Working as a Team Leader for a small team
Development and maintenance of .NET multilayered web application in C#, with Linq and Entity Framework
Development of RESTful API for the multilayered application
Development and maintenance of a classic ASP.NET application web application
Support for a MVC web application
Development of ETL scripts for data transfer between interrelated systems using SQL Server 2012

work.summary: Developing a .NET application with javascript in the frontend
highlights: Team working with Scrum methodology and JIRA for administration

Development of the frontend of the application using javascript and JQuery
Development of windows services serving the application
Development for automatically generate an incentive policy from specific parameters.
Support of a Web API for serve content
Support of an MVC application

work.summary: Development of a MVC application from scratch
highlights: Requirements gathering and analysis from the stakeholders

Frontend development with HTML5, CSS3 and JQuery
Team Leader for a small team
